document.full_text: alabama edged colorado in matchup of coaches whose former teams made the n.c.a.a. tournament. the crimson tide will face wichita state in the n.i.t. title game.
document.title: n.i.t. semifinals - alabama 62; colorado 61: given a shot, alabama takes hold
lines_and_colors: alabama edged colorado in matchup of coaches whose former teams made the n.c.a.a. tournament. the crimson tide will face wichita state in the n.i.t. title game.
